entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
